name: escalate_to_human_support
description: Escalates an issue to a human agent.

problem_description.description: A description of the problem to be escalated.

name: find_user
description: Finds a user by email or by name and zip code.

email.description: The email of the user to find.

user_name.description: The name of the user to find.

zip_code.description: The zip code of the user to find.

name: get_details
description:
Retrieves details for an order, product, or user, or lists all product types.

Only one action can be performed per call.

order_id.description: The ID of the order to retrieve.

product_id.description: The ID of the product to retrieve.

user_id.description: The ID of the user to retrieve.

list_product_types.description: If True, lists all available product types.

name: update_order
description:
Updates an order by performing one of several actions, such as cancellation,

modifying address, items, or payment for pending orders, or returning/exchanging
items for delivered orders.

Only one action can be performed per call.

order_id.description: The ID of the order to update.

cancel.description: If True, cancels the order. The order must be pending.

new_address_id.description: The new address ID for the order. The order must be pending.

items_to_add.description:
A list of items to add to the order. The order must be pending.
Each item is a dictionary with "product_id" and "quantity".

items_to_remove.description: A list of item IDs to remove from the order. The order must be pending.

new_payment_method_id.description: The new payment method ID. The order must be pending.

items_to_return.description:
A list of items to return. The order must be delivered.
Each item is a dictionary with "item_id" and "quantity".

items_to_exchange.description:
A list of items to exchange. The order must be delivered.
Each item is a dictionary with "item_id", "new_product_id", and "quantity".

user_id.description: The ID of the user to modify.

address1.description: The first line of the address, such as '123 Main St'.

address2.description: The second line of the address, such as 'Apt 1' or ''.
